title: SmoothImage
description: SmoothImage allows smoothing of images with adjustable sigma values, offering optional median filtering functionality.

image_dimension.title: Image Dimension
image_dimension.description: Specifies the dimensionality of the image.

image_ext.title: Image File
image_ext.description: The input image file to be smoothed.

smoothing_sigma.title: Smoothing Sigma
smoothing_sigma.description: The sigma value for smoothing. A separate sigma may be specified for each dimension, e.g., '1.5x1x2'.

sigma_units.title: Sigma Units
sigma_units.description: Determines if sigma is in spacing units (1) or not (0). Default is 0.

median_filter.title: Use Median Filter
median_filter.description: Whether to use median filter. Default is 0. If using median filter, sigma represents the radius in voxels.
